New features
~~~~~~~~~~~~



BundleMan 1.0.0
---------------

:Location: http://svn.nuxeo.org/pub/tools/bundleman/tags/1.0.0

:`Cheesecake  index`_: 464 out of a maximum of 545 points is 85%

:Released date: 2006-09-19


New features
~~~~~~~~~~~~

* First release
